title: MilkBoy the Studio | #1 Recording Studio in Philadelphia
text: HomePHILADELPHIA'S #1 PREMIER RECORDING STUDIONewsSTUDIOS STUDIO A "Studio A" is a George Augspurger designed studio that features his custom designed monitors. Our control room is 500sq. ft. and the studio is 1200sq. ft with 2 iso-rooms and 14.5 ft. ceilings.
